properties.description: raw files from Sa to ADLS
raw files from Sa to ADLS

scriptLines: select1 split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator== "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k",
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
desc({Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count }, false),
desc({Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count }, false)) ~> SortingByDateNCountryWeekly
